shows.title: Food waste and the environment
shows.desc:
Come and hear from the team who have been running our café all weekend, and find out why food waste is an environmental issue we can’t afford to ignore.

With Duncan Milwain, The Real Junk Food Project

shows.title: Be The Change. Love Food, Not Waste
shows.desc: We currently waste over one-third of the food produced in its journey from field to plate. Duncan Milwain from The Real Junk Food Project works his magic with festival left-overs – the stuff that we and the caterers are throwing away – to conjure a culinary miracle and challenge our assumptions around sell-by dates and the everyday food we throw away every day, and look at how collectively we can play our part in addressing the global food waste issue.
